title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 52.11 - Veterinary medicine
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 52.11 - Veterinary medicine

State Regulations

The prerequisite and professional study leading to the

Doctor of Veterinary Medicine degree shall meet accreditation standards from an
acceptable accrediting organization as defined in subdivision (a) of section
62.1
of this

Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
52.11

Adopted

New

York State Register March 27, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
